title: Trust Tokens
summary: Cloudflare proposed the concept of the [Privacy Pass protocol](https://privacypass.github.io/) to avoid repeatedly showing captchas to Tor users and Chrome expanded on the idea to propose a more general purpose [Trust Token API](https://github.com/dvorak42/trust-token-api) for conveying user trust between parties in order to prevent fraud.
goals: Determine interest level from implementers, discuss concerns.
